channel.title: [PI] Formationx Client without 508 maps all credits to Gabbe
channel.description:
Alot of people dont like 508 maps so if you have Formationx Source heres a client without 508 maps :)
[u][size=12pt]ALL CREDITS TO GABBE[/size][/u]
http://uppit.com/8cne0rgz3kxq/FormationX_NO_508_MAPS.rar
EDIT: Soz, link is there

item.title: [PI] Formationx Client without 508 maps all credits to Gabbe
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

Don’t know if its a virus? Too fucking lazy to check? Follow this guide!

  1. Download the Rar/Zip.
  2. Simiply check for any exes of suspicion.
  3. If no Exes or any other fucked up thing you can put in a rar/zip that can be a virus proceed and Extract if there is proceed to step 4.
  4. Close it and delete it from downloads.

Thank you for shopping at Walmart.

Read full topic

item.source: [PI] Formationx Client without 508 maps all credits to Gabbe

item.title: [PI] Formationx Client without 508 maps all credits to Gabbe
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:18, topic:407204”][quote author=Squirt Ltd link=topic=508493.msg3690149#msg3690149 date=1312068623]

I may use it. It could be useful considering the 508 maps glitch out like all hell.

solution: dont add new shit to older revisions
it would be so much better if people use 508s instead of fucking up the 317 client

I agree, though some added models are okay such as Dragon claws, or spirit shields. Their not that bad, just adding these new anims and shit are annoying to look at.

yeah , people need to face the fact that it would be easier to code a normal 508 instead of doing everyhing on a 317 client to make it look like it
for example hd
[/quote]

I’ve always favored 562’s but no one ever put enough time into them to make them playable.[/quote]

i only like 317-474
maybe if someone would host a perfect 508+ id play it but that aint gonna happen

Read full topic

How did you remove the 508 maps? I need to remove the gay wilderness ditch. It’s glitchy as fuck.
[/quote]

Gabbie released the client with out 508 maps since technically, there are some bugs found in the server with 508 maps added.[/quote]

I know, I’m asking how to get rid of them.
